TopicTitle: Please update the Xbox one version of ksp too many bugs

Articles.Content:
PLEASE update the xbox one version of ksp, it's very hard to play  with so many bugs. I love the game so much but geeze, guys come on. no navigation button, random freezing of ships, massive fsp drops for no reason, quick save problems and the list goes on and on. So please PLEASE help us out and fix some of this. 

Thank you
It's not SQUAD doing the port's, it's a third-party company.  SQUAD does not have much control over how fast ports go.

Agreed, I sympathize with those who bought KSP and can't play it due to it being on a console.

Edited March 7, 2017 by JacobJHC
Squad has contracted Blitworks to produce new console versions, this will take time, please be patient
